name: TouchMonkey
description:
THE CHALLENGE:
Touch the “good” monkeys and earn 30,000 or more points under 30 attempts.

TouchMonkeyTM is an intuitive, smooth, and addictive leisure activity. This application, designed for the iphone and ipad, challenges your ability to obtain 30,000 or more points, with less than 30 attempts. Your mission is to identify the good monkeys as many times as possible, with less than 30 tries, and gain 2,500 points each time. On the contrary, you lose 100 points for each unsuccessful attempt.

The game presents 3 monkeys on the lower level, at each round. The application randomly determines the “good” monkey and the player must touch the image in an attempt to identify that monkey. If the player touches the “good” monkey, the monkey rises to the top level, and the player gains 2,500 points. The player continues the rounds until the scores reach the thresholds established.
The game ends if the player obtains 30,000 or more points, or if the player exceeds 30 attempts. A performance summary page is then presented to the player.

FEATURES:
- The application randomly determines the “good” monkey, on each turn
- An intuitive activity, easy to understand and play, but hard to resist
- Your score is updated immediately after touching each “good” monkey
- Each attempt adds suspense, fun, and anticipation in every game
- No need to rush the activity. The game does not depend on time or speed
- Animated, clear on-screen messages provide instructions for the game
- A relaxing and exciting pastime; perfect for your leisure entertainment

SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS:
The game scene is presented. The instruction appears then, fades away.
1 - Touch any of the 3 monkeys to identify the “good” monkey.
- If correct, the monkey rises to the circle on the top level
- You earn 2,500 points if the monkey rises to the top
- If incorrect, you hear a beep and lose 100 points
2 - Continue touching the monkeys until all 3 heads are in the circles above.
3 - Touch “Continue Playing”, to return the monkeys to the lower level
4 - Repeat steps 1, 2 and 3 until you meet any of the 2 thresholds below.
- Gain 30,000 or more points with under 30 attempts
- Have 30 or more attempts before gaining 30,000 points
5 - The Summary scene appears immediately upon meeting any threshold
6 - On the Summary scene, follow the prompt to return to the Game Scene.

This game presents a unique and exciting leisure experience.
